text: ‘Yate te'omloke nijara kalyanara tha'iborata upasthita ha’ba parae arau allahe te'omlokaka catuspada jantura paraa yibora jiraika hicape dana karaiche se'iborara oparata nirdista dinaborata allahara nama uccarana karaiba parae. Seye tomaloke tara paraa nije khoraa arau dukhiya-nicala, abharagrastaka ahara karaoraa
